Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 30 Customer Service Associate/ Clerk Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 18, 2025, 15:56 IST
 Repco Bank
 30 Jobs |  Posted On : 18-Aug-2025 |  Tamil Nadu |  Salary : 24,050 to 64,480




FOLLOW

The Repco Bank has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 30 Customer Service Associate/ Clerk Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree can apply for the Repco Bank Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Tamil Nadu.

Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Customer Service Associate/ Clerk	30	Any Degree

Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For OBC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.
For PWD candidates: 10 Years.

Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Online Test.
Certificates Verification.

Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For General & Other candidates: Rs. 900/-.
For SC/ST/PWD candidates: Rs. 500/-.

Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 24,050/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 64,480/- per month.
How to Apply for the Repco Bank Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	18-08-2025
Closing date	08-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
